name: The Excerpt re-reloaded
author: Luca Biagini

sections.description:
This plugin does something more than the built-in excerpt function. It lets you choose excerpt length, allowed html tags, the link text to full post, the html container of the excerpt (

,

, or plain text) and whether to show or not emoticons.
